import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addToChart } from '../features/chart' import {Button, Card, Container} from 'react-bootstrap'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; const SingleItemCart = ({item, deleteItem}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() function addOtherItem(){ dispatch(addToChart(item)) } return ( <>

{item.title}

 {item.quantity} {item.price} {item.totalPrice.toFixed(2)} ) } export default SingleItemCart
